title: Permanent Ban Unfair
body:
I Have been playing Lol for 5+ years now and every season i'm in bronze i'm toxic i know... i have been silver 1 thrtee times now almost gold then a new season starts... i got 8-2 last season qualifiers you put me bronze three and i carried s- or better every single game... then this season same thing 7-3 bronze 3 it just doesn't make any sense... the game i get permanent banned on i went 24-8 with fizz and lost!!! in pre game lobby our team yi said report me cause i didn't take flash... yes i wanted yi to get reported and banned so i said things... bronze is so frustrating. So since i'm losing a 5 year account for trying to get out of bronze and get to gold  forever when your system is flawed beyond measure i will now never play this game again and over the years the 20-30 people i have got joined the league community and  thousands of dollars spent on accounts i would like to say FUCK YOU RIOT! Dota, Smite, Paragon, Battlebourn overwork are going to take ya out of the spotlight real soon here and its for reasons such as these.
Sincerely 5+ year account holder

You are completely allowed to swear, just not at someone.

"Fuck, I missed" is allowed

"Fuck you, Yi" is not.

unfortunately, if too many reports are done to your account, and the system triggers, the automatic chat scan will no differenciate ''fuck, I missed'' from ''Fuck you, yi''.

It will only retain de word ''fuck'' and use it against you.


Of course, if someone swears alot but never directs it at anyone and stays friendly, then there is little chance he will get reported. But if you are indeed toxic to some extent and also curse at yourself, the system won't make any difference of it if it is triggered by regular reports.


That is why most people vouch for the ''just don't say anything in chat'' guideline.

replies.body:
You've gotten multiple warnings and you did not reform.

They don't ban you off of one game. You've been getting reported continuously game after game that they realized they needed to completely suspend your account.

I think it goes as follows...

10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
2 week ban
Permanent Suspension

You got all those before they decided to close your account. Riot doesn't just ban someone off of one game.

And who knows you're lucky they don't take all the 'BANS' you got in the past 5 years. I'm sure it's plenty from the attitude and toxicity you show here. You're 5 years older now from when you started playing and raging...have you not learned anything or grown up?
